items.name: Ammo - rough
items.description: A single piece of rough ammo, enough for one shot.

items.name: Ammo - basic
items.description: A single piece of basic ammo, enough for one shot.

items.name: Ammo - special
items.description: A single piece of special ammo, enough for one shot.

items.name: Med kit
items.description: A single med kit. When used, restores 5 hit-points.
items.details: Emergency medical supplies for battlefield healing.

items.name: Strange idol
items.description: A strange alien idol. The owner may reroll a failed (P) roll in exchange for 1 hit point.
items.details: Mysterious artifact of unknown origin with psychic properties.

items.name: Stimulants
items.description: A single dose of stimulants. When used, the user gains +1 to all their skills for 1D6 turns. Each successive use of stimulants requires an additional dose to work. (E.g. The first use only needs 1 dose, the second needs 2, the third 3 etc.)
items.details: Powerful combat enhancers with diminishing returns.

items.name: Safety deposit box
items.description: A safe box in a reputable galactic bank. Your warband may take any items from their inventory and store them in the deposit box. These items are not in your character's inventory during games but can be retrieved at any time in-between games.
items.details: Secure storage for valuables between missions.

items.name: Psyka
items.description: A powerful drug, distilled from the spinal fluids of potent psychics. When used, the user may use a single arcane ability of their choice, regardless of any required traits. After each use roll 1D10; if the result is greater than the number of times the character has ever used Psyka, nothing happens. If the result is lower, then the user has become addicted. Psyka now has no effect, but they must use a dose at the start of each game or not take part.
items.details: Highly dangerous psychic-enhancing substance with severe addiction potential.

special_rules.One-use: This item is consumed after a single use.
special_rules.Healing: Restores hit points to the character.
special_rules.Blood Sacrifice: Requires the user to sacrifice hit points for an effect.
special_rules.Addictive: Repeated use can lead to addiction with negative consequences.
special_rules.Storage: Provides a way to store other items.
special_rules.Psychic Enhancement: Temporarily grants access to psychic abilities.
special_rules.Addiction Risk: Risk of addiction increases with each use.
